identity.mission: Create a high-performance, dark-mode fitness app that feels like a tactical tool, not a generic template.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix tactical gear aesthetics with high-end sports data visualization.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'heavy' and 'deliberate', like lifting weights.
Content is King: Data (reps, weight, macros) must be legible at a glance in a dark gym.
Zoom In: Focus on the numbers. Big typography for timers and rep counters.
Negative Space: Don't clutter. Use deep black space to let the data breathe.

usage.background: Use #0A0A0A for the main app background. No gradients.
usage.cards: Use #1C1C1E for workout cards and list items. Add a subtle border #3A3A3C.
usage.primary_action: Use #FF3B30 (Electric Red) for 'Start Workout', 'Log Set', and primary CTAs.
usage.secondary_action: Use #007AFF (Volt Blue) for Water Tracker and Information.

headings.family: Barlow Condensed, Oswald, or System Bold
headings.usage: Screen titles, Section headers, Big Data metrics

monospace.family: JetBrains Mono, Menlop, or System Monospace

rules: DO NOT use HTML tags (div, span, h1, img). Use React Native primitives only.
DO NOT use '100vh' or '100vw'. Use 'flex: 1' or Dimensions API.
Use 'gap' property in flex containers for spacing (supported in newer RN).
Ensure minimum touch target size (44x44) for all buttons.

grids.dashboard: Bento Grid Style using Flexbox with wrap. Mix 100% width cards with 50% width stats.
grids.calculators: Vertical Scrollable List. Each calculator is a full-width card.
grids.workout_log: Dense Table-like rows using FlexRow. Input fields for Set/Rep/Weight.

auth.style: Minimalist input fields with floating labels. Strong 'Login' button.
auth.security: Use SecureStore for tokens. Do not store passwords in plain text.

widgets: Quick Log Button (Floating Action Button - FAB)

calculators.layout: Input Form with Slider or Numeric Input. Result card pops up with animation.

workout_logging.ux: Focus on speed. Auto-fill previous weights. Large +/- buttons for reps.
workout_logging.visuals: Table rows with 'Set', 'Kg', 'Reps'. Swipe to delete set.

progress_photos.layout: Side-by-side comparison slider. Grid view of dates.
progress_photos.privacy: Blur sensitive previews by default (optional setting).

anti_slop: No default shadows (use sharp custom shadows or glow).
No centered text on long paragraphs.
interaction: Use 'Pressable' with 'style={({pressed}) => opacity: pressed ? 0.7 : 1}' for feedback.
KeyboardAvoidView is MANDATORY for all forms.

accessibility.touch_targets: Min 44px height for inputs and buttons.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a React Native Expo app (TypeScript).
Use 'app/(tabs)' for the main navigation structure.
Use 'components/ui' for reusable atoms (Button, Input, Card).
Follow the 'Dark Mode Fitness' aesthetic strictly.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
